-- Generated by CSharp.lua Compiler
local System = System
System.namespace("DCET", function (namespace)
  namespace.interface("IDeserializeSystem", function ()
    return {}
  end)

  -- <summary>
  -- 反序列化后执行的System
  -- 要小心使用这个System，因为对象假如要保存到数据库，到dbserver也会进行反序列化，那么也会执行该System
  -- </summary>
  namespace.class("DeserializeSystem_1", function (namespace)
    return function (T)
      local Run, Type
      Run = function (this, o)
        this:Deserialize(System.cast(T, o))
      end
      Type = function (this)
        return System.typeof(T)
      end
      return {
        base = function (out)
          return {
            out.DCET.IDeserializeSystem
          }
        end,
        Run = Run,
        Type = Type
      }
    end
  end)
end)
